title: Working for a Bank
transcript: the next question is I working in an Islamic Bank and it has been acquired by another bank I may lose my job and I have got an offer from a non-islamic bank should I join the non-islamic bank pleas advice Allah says in chapter 5 collaborate upon righteousness and virtue and do not collaborate upon aggression and vice and sin so joining an a un-islamic bank which is a conventional interest based bank is totally prohibited even if you work as a janitor or as a security uh uh guard or as a driver you have nothing to do with collecting riba you are collaborating with them and the scholars say that this is not permissible may Allah provide for you and for all of us Halal risk
